xuiTransientCacheFactory
service in module xui

Description

Factory that constructs ITransientCache objects and provides access to them.

Source













Demo






Methods


  • count(cacheId)
    

    Return the count of ITransientCache objects.
    

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    cacheIdstring
    Unique identifier of the cache.
    

    Returns
    number
    Count of ITransientCache objects.
    

    

    • 

  • create(cacheId, optionsMap)
    

    returns a newly created ITransientCache object for use.
    

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    cacheIdstring
    unique identifier of the cache
    

    optionsMapany
    object that specifies the cache behavior.
Properties: {number=} capacity â€” turns the cache into LRU cache.
    

    Returns
    ITransientCache
    newly created ITransientCache object.
    

    ITransientCache interface:
    

     put(key:string, value:any, lifetime:number) => IPromise<void> -
     Puts a new key-value pair into the cache with the lifetime specified and returns it.
 get(key:string) => any - Returns cached value for key or undefined for cache miss.
 remove(key:string) - Removes pair from the cache identified by the key.
 removeAll() - Removes all cached pairs.
 destroy() - Removes references to this cache from xuiTransientCacheFactory.

    

    • 

  • get(cacheId)
    

    Get access to an ITransientCache object by the cacheId used when it was created.

    cacheIdstring
    Unique identifier of the cache.
    

    Returns
    ITransientCache
    cache Identified by cacheId. See
ITransientCache.
